description: This file serves as an SSR entry point for a Qwik-based application, responsible for rendering the application outside the browser (server-side rendering). It imports rendering functions, a manifest, and the root component, and exports a default function that initiates SSR rendering with customizable options.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Exports a default function that renders the root component to a stream with provided options, including manifest, container attributes, and server data.
